name: Add team restrictions of protected branch

previews.name: hellcat
previews.description:
**Note:** The Nested Teams API is currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2017-08-30-preview-nested-teams) for full details. To access the API, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.17/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.hellcat-preview+json

```

description:
Grants the specified teams push access for this branch. If you pass the `hellcat-preview` media type, you can also give push access to child teams.

| Type    | Description                                                                                                                         |
| ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `array` | The teams that can have push access. Use the team's `slug`. **Note**: The list of users and teams in total is limited to 100 items. |
